examples.korean: We sold the car for scrap. 발음듣기 우리는 그 자동차를 폐품 처리용으로 팔았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We sold the car for scrap. 발음

examples.korean: Much of their furniture was scavenged from other people’s garbage. 발음듣기 그들의 가구들 중 많은 것들이 다른 사람들이 내다 버린 폐품을 뒤져 가져온 것이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Much of their furniture was scavenged from other people’s garbage. 발음

examples.korean: The decision to close the factory has consigned 6000 people to the scrap heap. 발음듣기 그 공장 폐쇄 결정으로 6천 명의 사람들이 폐품 취급을 당하게 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The decision to close the factory has consigned 6000 people to the scrap heap. 발음

examples.korean: The man is opening up the junkyard. 발음듣기 남자가 폐품 처리장 문을 열고 있다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The man is opening up the junkyard. 발음

examples.korean: Recyclers are putting plastic bottles in barrels. 발음듣기 폐품 재활용을 하는 사람들이 플라스틱 병을 드럼통에 담고 있다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Recyclers are putting plastic bottles in barrels. 발음
